alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 10:29PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN WEBB COUNTY THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1029 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ranchitos Las Lomas to 8 miles southwest of Aguilares to 9 miles north of San Ygnacio. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Rio Bravo, Oilton, Ranchitos Las Lomas, Mirando City, Aguilares, and Bruni. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 800 and 820. US Highway 83 between mile markers 730 and 734. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
